title: Stacey Abrams | Did Manafort Lie to Mueller to Protect Trump?: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump insisting the Russia investigation has found nothing even after his ex-campaign chairman lied to the FBI.

Then, Stacey Abrams talks about delivering the 2019 Democratic response to Trump's State of the Union and what she thinks should happen next if Trump declares a national emergency.

She also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.
